official_title: A bill to establish the New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park in New Bedford, Massachussetts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park in New Bedford, Massachusetts. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to submit to specified congressional committees a general management plan for the Park and to implement such plan. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish the New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park in New Bedford, Massachussetts, and for other purposes.
